Element.Description: BEAst: T0125/T6338, Despatch Advice Number Peppol:
BEAst: T6325, Document Date/Time. Peppol:
BEAst: T6325, Document Date/Time. Peppol:
BEAst: Must be used when the Despatch Advice is replaced or deleted. Default is Original, and the status code is not needed in the first transmission. Peppol:
BEAst: Indicates if the Despatch Advice is sent before the delivery or after the delivery. Default is that it is sent before delivery (1). Peppol:
BEAst: Used for Transport Information (T6008). Peppol:
BEAst: T3309/T6335, Order Number/Call Off Reference. Peppol:

Element.Name: Additional document reference
Element.Description: BEAst: Used for additional BEAst information on header level. The whole group can be repeated to send multiple additional information. Peppol:

BEAst: The reference number of the added information. Can be the Project Number (T6004), Accounting Cost (T6005), Seller's Order Number (T6099), Final Customer's Order Number (T6221), Drawing Number (T6222), Delivery Part (T6340), Freight Payer's Customer Number (T6463) or Document Name (T6484) depending on DocumentType. Peppol:
BEAst: Not a part of version 3.1, but use this code instead of the text if possible. An example is "174" for DrawingNumber (T6222) Peppol:

BEAst: The type of reference when a valid code is not possible to use. "ProjectReference" (T6004), "AccountingCost" (T6005), "FreightPayersCustomerNumber" (T6463), "SellersOrderNumber" (T6099), "FinalCustomersOrderNumber" (T6221), "DeliveryPart" (T6340) or Any other document type (T6473). Peppol:
BEAst: The referenced document can here be inserted as a binary object (T6475). Peppol:

Attribute.Description: BEAst: filename refers to T6476. Peppol:

Element.Description: BEAst: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies the external object as an Internet resource (T6187). Peppol:

BEAst: This party defines the company that provides the goods or the service. It also defines the sender of the Despatch Advice. The real Ship-from Address must be provided in the Despatch Address when the Despatch Advice describes a movement. Peppol:
BEAst: Shipper (T0129) Peppol:

Attribute.Description: BEAst: Strongly recommended to use even though it is not mandatory in Peppol. Peppol:

Element.Description: BEAst: Party Name (T5001) Peppol:
BEAst: Street Name (T5003) Peppol:
BEAst: Used for Department (T5002). Peppol:
BEAst: City Name (T5005) Peppol:
BEAst: Postal Code (T6117) Peppol:
BEAst: Used for any other additional address information like Building (T5004). Peppol:
BEAst: Country Code (T5007) Peppol:
BEAst: Party Name (T5001) Peppol:
BEAst: Name (T5012) Peppol:
BEAst: Phone Number (T5010) Peppol:
BEAst: Email Address (T5011) Peppol:

BEAst: This party defines the company that receives the goods or the service. It also defines the receiver of the Despatch Advice. The real Ship-to Address must be provided in the Delivery Location if the Despatch Advice describes a movement. If the Despatch address describes a service provided at a specific location, the Delivery Location contains this location. Peppol:
BEAst: Consignee (T0036) Peppol:

Attribute.Description: BEAst: Strongly recommended to use even though it is not mandatory in Peppol. Peppol:

BEAst: For 3PL shipments, this party defines the final receiver of the goods. Peppol:
BEAst: Ultimate Customer ID (T6001 or T6223). Peppol:

Attribute.Description: BEAst: Strongly recommended to use even though it is not mandatory in Peppol. Peppol:

Element.Description: BEAst: Ultimate Customer name (T5001). Peppol:
BEAst: Street Name (T5003). Peppol:
BEAst: City name (T5005). Peppol:
BEAst: Postal code (T6117). Peppol:
BEAst: Country code (T5007). Peppol:
BEAst: T6127, Freight forwarders referens number Peppol:
BEAst: Used by BEAst for Supplier Remark (T6038). Peppol:
BEAst: Total Gross Weight (T6472) Peppol:
BEAst: Total Gross Volume (T6494) Peppol:
BEAst: Use a dummy value since this element is mandatory. Peppol:

BEAst: Code to specify additional service from the transport company (T6466) where unique codes per transport company will be used, or for Unloading instructions code (T6343). The Unloading Instruction Codes are as follows: Z50=Semitrailer removable roof, Z51=Truck, Z52=Truck with tail lift, Z53=Truck with crane max 4 m, Z54=Truck with crane 4-9 m, Z55=Truck with crane more than 9 m, Z56=Forklift, Z57=Semitrailer, Z58=Short term storage, Z59=Porterage, Z60=Carry-in service, Z61=Standard transport, Z62=Loaded on truck, Z63=Indoor storage, Z64=Outdoor storage, Z65=Package maximum weigh, ZZ=Mutually agreed. Peppol:

Attribute.Description: BEAst: Use listID HandlingCode for the BEAst codes listed above. Peppol:

Element.Description: BEAst: Unloading Instruction (T6344). Peppol:
BEAst: Carrier (T3208). Peppol:

Attribute.Description: BEAst: It is recommended to use the schemeID. Peppol:

Element.Description: BEAst: Party Name (T5001) Peppol:

BEAst: To define the type of measurement. EnergyContent = T6428, ConversionFactor = T6429, FuelConsumption = T6374, DrivingDistance = T6380, DrivingTime = T6381, FuelMeasurementMethod = T6728, EngineType = T6379, RenewableFuel = T6382. Peppol:
BEAst: The measured value. Used for EnergyContent, ConversionFactor, FuelConsumption, DrivingDistance, DrivingTime and RenewableFuel. Peppol:

Attribute.Description: BEAst: unitCode refers to T6706. Peppol:

Element.Description: BEAst: Description of the attribute when there is no value to measure. Used for FuelMeasurementMethod and EngineType. Possible values are for FuelMeasurementMethod: "AutomaticMeasurement", "StandardEstimate", "ManualMeasurement" and for EngineType: "Euro2", "Euro3", "Euro4", "Euro5", "Euro6", "EuroStep2", "EuroStep3A", "EuroStep3B", "EuroStep4". Peppol:
BEAst: Defines the type of emission reported. Values: "CO2" (Carbon Dioxide), NOX (Nitrogen Oxide), PM (Particulate Matter), HC (Hydro Carbon). Peppol:

Attribute.Description: BEAst: The textual equivalent for the code. Peppol:

Element.Description: BEAst: The value of the emission. Refers to Carbon Dioxide/Nitrogen Oxide/Particulate Matter/Hydro Carbon. Peppol:
BEAst: Transport mode (T6131). Peppol:
BEAst: Used for Transport Information (T6008). Peppol:
BEAst: Tracking URL (T6737) Peppol:
BEAst: Identifies the Delivery Location (T0036). Peppol:

Attribute.Description: BEAst: Strongly recommended to use even though it is not mandatory in Peppol. Peppol:

Element.Description: BEAst: The name of the Consignee (T5001). Peppol:
BEAst: Street name (T5003). Peppol:
BEAst: Used for Department (T5002). Peppol:
BEAst: Name of city (T5005). Peppol:
BEAst: Zip-code (T6117). Peppol:
BEAst: Country Sub-entity. Peppol:
BEAst: Used for any other additional address information like Building (T5004). Peppol:
BEAst: Country code (T5007). Peppol:
BEAst: The X coordinate (T6324). Use degrees with decimals. Peppol:
BEAst: The Y coordinate (T6325). Use degrees with decimals. Peppol:
BEAst: The Z coordinate (T6424). Peppol:
BEAst: Unloading Date and Time (T6372)/Delivery Period Start Date (T6319) Peppol:
BEAst: Unloading Date and Time (T6372)/Delivery Period Start Time (T6734) Peppol:
BEAst: Delivery Period End Date (T6320) Peppol:
BEAst: Delivery Period End Time (T6735) Peppol:
BEAst: Loading Date and Time (T6371)/Despatch Date and Time (T6242) Peppol:
BEAst: Loading Date and Time (T6371)/Despatch Date and Time (T6242) Peppol:
BEAst: The Despatch Address is used to define the Ship-from when the Despatch Supplier Party is not. When the Despatch Advice describes a movement, the Despatch Address should be included. Peppol:
BEAst: Identity of the Despatch Address (T0129). Peppol:
BEAst: Street Name (T5003). Peppol:
BEAst: Used for Department (T5002). Peppol:
BEAst: City Name (T5005). Peppol:
BEAst: Postal Code (T6117). Peppol:
BEAst: Used for any other additional address information like Building (T5004). Peppol:
BEAst: Country Code (T5007). Peppol:
BEAst: The X coordinate (T6323). Use degrees with decimals. Peppol:
BEAst: The Y coordinate (T6324). Use degrees with decimals. Peppol:
BEAst: The Z coordinate (T6424). Peppol:
BEAst: Delivery Terms code (T6710). Peppol:
BEAst: Delivery Terms Location (T6020). The location to which the delivery terms refer. Used to qualify the delivery terms e.g. "Terms of delivery are FOB Rotterdam" Peppol:
BEAst: The SSCC identification code of this Transport Handling Unit (T0138). Peppol:
BEAst: Type of Transport Handling Unit (T6119). Use UN/ECE Recommendation 21. Peppol:
BEAst: Description handling instruction code (T6199) or Unloading instruction code (T6343). Peppol:
BEAst: Description handling instruction text (T6200) or Unloading instruction (T6344). Peppol:
BEAst: Shipping marks consignment (T0086) or Seller shipping marks consignment (T6065). Peppol:

Element.Value: A 20 foot refrigerated container that is not actively controlling temperature of the product.

Element.Description: BEAst: To describe the type of measurement (T6714). Use UNCL 6313 subset. Peppol:
BEAst: For the measure (T6122) and Measure of Unit Code (T6706). Use UN/ECE Recommendation 20 and 21. subset. Peppol:
BEAst: The items packed directly on the TransportHandlingUnit are described here. Peppol:
BEAst: The packages packed on the TransportHandlingUnit are described here. Peppol:
BEAst: The packages packed in the larger package are described here. Peppol:
BEAst: The packages packed in the medium sized package are described here. Peppol:
BEAst: The items packed in the inner package are described here. Peppol:
BEAst: The items packed in the middle package are described here. Peppol:
BEAst: The items packed in the package on the TransportHandlingUnit are described here. Peppol:
BEAst: Measured attribute code (T6714) Peppol:
BEAst: Measure (T6122) Peppol:

Element.Description: BEAst: Delivered Quantity (T0070)/Despatched Quantity (T0131). unitCode refers to T6706 Peppol:
BEAst: Backordered Quantity (T0059). unitCode refers to T6706 Peppol:
BEAst: Change Reason Description (T6220) Peppol:
BEAst: Calloff Line Reference (T6336)/Reference to Order Line (T3322) Peppol:
BEAst: Reference to the sellers orderline number (T6462). Peppol:
BEAst: Order Number (T3309) Peppol:
BEAst: Vendor order number (T6099) Peppol:

BEAst: ID of the referenced document or item: Reference to Delivery Note (T0063), Customers Reference Number (T6005), Offer Number (T6010), Vendors Order Number (T6099), Ultimate Customer's Order Number (T6221), Drawing Number (T6222), Material Ticket Number (T6329), Material Ticket Reference (T6337), Delivery Unit (T6340), Reference to Web (T6373), Ultimate Customer's Order Line Number (T6458), Offer Line Number (T6466) or Document Name (T6484). Peppol:
BEAst: Use this code if possible instead of DocumentType. Peppol:

BEAst: Identifies the type of document or item. ("ReferenceToDeliveryNote", "CustomersReferenceNumber", "OfferNumber", "EndCustomersOrderNumber", "DrawingNumber", "MaterialTicketNumber", "MaterialTicketReference", "DeliveryUnit", "ReferenceToWeb", "EndCustomersOrderLineNumber", "OfferLineNumber", any other type of document or item). Peppol:
BEAst: The referenced document can here be inserted as a binary object (T6475). Peppol:

Attribute.Description: BEAst: filename refers to T6476. Peppol:

Element.Description: BEAst: A reference to an attached document that is external to the document(s) being exchanged. Peppol:
BEAst: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies the external object as an Internet resource (T6187). Peppol:
BEAst: Article Description (T6226) Peppol:
BEAst: Buyers Part Article Number (T6022)/Article Number (T0172) when T6317="BP"/Littera (T6417). Peppol:
BEAst: Suppliers Article Number (T0172) Peppol:
BEAst: Only one Standard Item Number can be used per line. Peppol:

BEAst: Global Trade Item Number (T0154) or RSK Article Number Sweden (T6023). All other item number standards used within BEAst can not be used here until the organisation behind the standard decides to be a part of the codelist "ISO 6523 ICD". These are: NOBB Article Number (T6027), RT Article Number (T6460), TUN Article Number (T6028), Finfo/Vilma Article Number (T6029), Norwegian RSK Article Number (T6024), Norwegian E-number (T6026), E-number (T0260) and SGTIN (T6461). Peppol:

BEAst: Used to classify the material when the item number is not sufficient (T6466), to inform about the source of classification standard (T6467) and to provide standard branch codes for the items. The Reference to Article Class (T6466) is the ItemClassificationCode, listID = "ZZZ", listVersionID the version of the codelist in attribute "name" and name is the name of the codelist or Source to Classification (T6467). Peppol:

Attribute.Description: BEAst: For Item Classification Codes that are found in UNCL7143, select the correct code and leave listVersionID and name empty. For construction specific list that are not a part of UNCL7143 yet ListID must always be "ZZZ" and listVersionID the version of the codelist in attribute "name", i.e. mutually agreed. Peppol:

BEAst: If construction specific lists are used, name specifies which of them is used. Possible names are: "SBMI", "SA", "AI", “ME” and "CoClass”. "SBMI" = Sveriges Bergmaterialindustrier, "SA" = Sveriges Åkeriföretag, "AI" = Återvinningsindustrierna, “ME” = Maskinentreprenörerna. Peppol:

Element.Description: BEAst: Dangerous Goods Code (T0169) Peppol:
BEAst: Dangerous Goods, Hazard Code (T0263) Peppol:

BEAst: This group is also in BEAst used for ConfigurationValue (T6369), GUID Identifier (T6408), Treatment code (T6468), Alternative Vehicle Type (T6339), EPD data, NeC additional information about Asphalt and Concrete, Price information and Rental additional information. Peppol:
BEAst: Product Group Code (T0011), Property Name (T6446), Product Type Description (T6442). When the NameCode is used, the name can be set to "NA" since it is mandatory to have. Peppol:
BEAst: Property ID NeC (T6469), Property ID Type (T6443), Identity Type Code (T6440). Peppol:

BEAst: Price Amount (T6235), Configuration Value (T6369), GUID Identifier (T6408), Property Class ID (T6441), Property Value (T6452), Treatment Code (T6468), Rental Indicator (T6477) or Article Property (T6470). The Rental Indicator (T6477) is changed from "True"/"False" to "Rental"/"Purchase". Peppol:
BEAst: Property Compare Code (T6457), Price Unit Basis Quantity (T6722). unitCode refers to Measure Unit NeB Type (T6706). Peppol:
BEAst: Property Value ID (T6450), Price Specification Code (T6721). Peppol:
BEAst: Production or Manufacture Date (T0262) Peppol:
BEAst: Best Before Date (T3276) Peppol:
BEAst: Serial Number (T3236) or SGTIN (T6461) Peppol:
BEAst: Batch Number (T0132). Peppol:
BEAst: Certificate Number (T6413). Peppol:
BEAst: The UBL structure used requires this element. Use the value NA. Peppol:
BEAst: Identifies the type of Certificate (T6412). Peppol:
BEAst: Used to inform about how much is certified, in percent (T6414). Peppol:
BEAst: The authorized organization that issued this certificate, the provider of the certificate. Peppol:
BEAst: The name of the party issuing the certificate. Peppol:
BEAst: The UBL structure used requires this element. Use the value NA. Peppol:
